complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the encrypted messaging implementation into subtasks covering database schema design, encryption implementation, Supabase Realtime integration, UI components for DMs, UI components for group chats, and testing strategy.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity due to encryption requirements, real-time functionality, and multiple UI components. Requires careful consideration of security, performance, and user experience.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide the venues knowledge base into subtasks for database schema design, CRUD operations implementation, search/filtering functionality, and markdown rendering with pinning features.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Medium complexity with standard CRUD operations but enhanced by search functionality, markdown formatting, and RLS implementation.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the multi-channel notifications into subtasks for Twilio SMS integration, Resend email integration, in-app notification center, user preference management, and notification trigger implementation.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity due to multiple external API integrations, user preference management, and various notification triggers requiring careful coordination.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide the CSV export functionality into subtasks for UI implementation, data query and CSV generation, and RLS enforcement for data access.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Lower complexity with straightforward CSV generation and standard UI components, though requires careful handling of data access permissions.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the account approval dashboard into subtasks for pending accounts list view, approval/rejection functionality, database updates, and notification implementation.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Medium complexity with standard dashboard UI components but requires careful handling of approval workflows and notification delivery.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide the org announcements modal into subtasks for database schema design, modal UI implementation, view/engagement tracking, and display logic for login and dashboard.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Medium complexity with standard UI components but enhanced by tracking functionality and conditional display logic.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the PWA implementation into subtasks for manifest configuration, service worker setup, offline caching strategy, push notification implementation, and testing across devices.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity due to service worker configuration, offline caching strategies, and push notification implementation requiring careful testing across devices.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Implement Stripe Billing and Subscription Management
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide the Stripe integration into subtasks for API integration, subscription management UI, webhook handling, billing data security, subscription lifecycle management, and testing strategy.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity due to financial transactions, webhook handling, and security considerations requiring careful implementation and thorough testing.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Build Marketing Site and Landing Page
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the marketing site into subtasks for landing page design and implementation, features and pricing sections, Stripe checkout integration, and signup flow implementation.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Medium complexity with standard web development tasks but enhanced by Stripe checkout integration and signup flow requirements.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Implement Cloudflare Proxy, WAF, and CDN
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide the Cloudflare implementation into subtasks for DNS and proxy configuration, WAF rules setup, CDN optimization for static assets, and performance/security monitoring.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Medium-high complexity due to security configurations, performance optimization, and ongoing monitoring requirements.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Build Expo/React Native Shell for App Stores
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the Expo/React Native shell into subtasks for project setup, component reuse strategy, platform-specific adaptations, build configuration, and app store submission preparation.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity due to cross-platform considerations, component reuse challenges, and app store submission requirements.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Implement AI Feature Flags and Pilot
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide the AI feature flags implementation into subtasks for feature flag system design, role matching AI implementation, scheduling copilot implementation, feedback collection mechanism, and metrics analysis.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity due to AI integration, feature flag management, and feedback collection requiring careful implementation and analysis.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Implement Multi-Organization Support and Organization ID Generation
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the implementation into: 1) Organization ID generation logic, 2) User-organization membership table design and migration, 3) Active organization context management, 4) Authentication and session management updates, 5) RLS and middleware updates, 6) UI for organization selection and switching, 7) Comprehensive testing strategy for all scenarios.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task involves multiple architectural changes (database schema, session management, RLS, authentication flow, UI updates) and requires careful coordination to ensure data integrity, security, and user experience. The high complexity is due to the need for robust uniqueness checks, multi-tenancy support, session state management, and thorough regression testing across all affected systems[3][4][5].
